message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This feels like a fair price that acknowledges the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,250?
